data.content:
noun
[noncount] of or relating to ways of thinking and living that are similar to those of older cultures and that have been accepted in recent times by a group of people in place of the usual beliefs and methods of modern society
the New Age movement
a New Age bookstore
New Age spirituality
used to describe a type of instrumental music that is usually soft and relaxing
He likes to listen to New Age music.
a New Age composer
